Usage

The easiest way to get up and running is to use Bower, but you can also download the compiled CSS and use it however you see fit.

Bower

You can easily install BBC Internal Bootstrap using Bower, like so:

{% highlight bash %} bower install git@github.com:bbc-fm-nk-core-eng/bbc-internal-bootstrap -S {% endhighlight %}

Download

Alternatively, you can download the source of the latest release, which has a dist directory containing all the compiled CSS. The latest release is v0.1.7

 Download v0.1.7

Contributing

Improvements and additions to BBC Internal Bootstrap are encouraged. All we ask is that you follow a simple workflow:

  1. Clone or fork the repository
  2. Create a new branch with a descriptive name
  3. Open a pull request

Details on how to build a copy of the library can be found in the README.
